page.title: 07SAILING ON WHALSAY
page.content: Every year the men who sail the Shetland model boats take part in a regatta,held in August. A Shetland model boat is a full-size boat about 4.5m long built to a traditional design.Whalsay's biggest model boat is the"White Wings"and she is over 4.5m long.Most of the Shetland model boats are just over 4.3m. Nearly all the men who sail the Shetland model boats go off to the fishing as well and when they are home they sail for a hobby. From May til August,on Saturdays and Thursdays the boats sail in points races.A Shetland model boat has a crew of three.The races start and finish at the harbour entrance.There are about 25 Whalsay boats that compete in the sailing.
